REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0212 reute r f BC-FLYING-TIGERS-<TGR>-A 03-09 0048

TEXT.TITLE: FLYING TIGERS <TGR> ADDS AIR CARGO ROUTES
TEXT.BODY: Flying Tigers said it has expanded its air cargo routes to include Asia-to-Europe jetfreighter flights. The company also said it is launching a jetfreighter service to Milan, Italy. Both routes will operate weekly. Reuter
